description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Tennis finals - Newport, '13, McLoughlin serving 1913 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows the United States National Championship tennis finals at Newport Casino, Newport, Rhode Island. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.14500 Call Number: LC-B2- 2858-3
